name: Color Island: Paint by Number
description:
Coloring welcomes mindfulness and reduces stress. Choose from a wide range of fascinating artworks in our gallery and color by number with great pleasure!

Color Island: Paint by Number is a perfect art therapy app for adults as well as children because it is a relaxing exercise that can take your mind off of other things. It gives the brain a break while you do not need to keep track of time but only enjoy the moment.

Outstanding features:
- Coloring objects & build your land: Tons of amazing black-white painting objects to choose from and many lands to explore. You will never run out of free artworks.
- Painting the right color: Easy coloring and no need wifi. Enjoy intuitive design and smooth performance of pixel art.
- Paint booster feature: Paint all the connected pixel with the same number to complete the object quicker.
- Unlocking new land: Having enough stars and happiness points during coloring will unlock a new land.

What Color Island: Paint by Number can do:
- Reduces overthinking.
- Cuts down on stress and anxiety.
- Boosts memory.
- Increases focus and emotional control.
- Enhances intuition.

Coloring offers an escape to all the stress and responsibilities of adult life without having to spend a lot of money or time on the activity. Even if you only have 30 minutes to spare each day, carving out the time for this quiet activity can make a big difference in your mindset!

Download and enjoy Color Island: Paint by Number now!
